alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 7:21PM EDT until July 06 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Barnwell County in central South Carolina... South central Aiken County in central South Carolina... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 721 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Savannah River Site, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Barnwell, Savannah River Site, Williston, Barnwell State Park, Snelling, Elko and Barnwell County Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways or walk through high water.
